long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE: New graphics and 2.0 is now in the works! Expect tons of features to release.

This is a clean, minimal, simple colour picker to use! This can be used for productivity usage or developing and much more!

[ Extension Information ]

- Hex Codes
- RGB Codes
- HSL Codes 
- Export tool to export your hex codes, RGB codes, HSL, codes as well onto a txt file.

------------------------------------------------------------

[ Purpose of a Colour Picker ]

The purpose of an actual colour picker is for graphic designing to pick colours which look effective and stand out and web development is another one to get the right background colours for contrast and clean colours and it's also useful for UI work as well.

------------------------------------------------------------

[ INSTRUCTIONS TO USE ]

1) Download the extension from above (If you have enhanced browsing mode enabled a prompt will appear and click on "Install" the reason of this is because this extension does not require any permission and is fully safe.
2) Once the download has completely finished, now open up the extension which can be found on the right side top of chrome and then if you have various ones you may need to scroll down to find the right one and then open it.
3) You’ll see “Pick Colour” option and you can pretty much use the eyedropper anywhere you'd like, once you've chosen a colour simply click and then your colour will automatically add and be saved.
